duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform preventative maintenance and minor repairs on a fleet of vehicles.
Use advanced tools and technologies to log, research, and complete repairs.
Partner with supervisors to learn new skills and receive hands-on coaching.
Complete vehicle component lubrication and replacement, some electrical system repairs, and cooling system maintenance on gas and diesel engine vehicles.
Work on other projects and tasks as assigned by supervisor.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent preferred; vocational or technical certification in vehicle repair preferred
